Translations.Text: Say Co if GOD robit night perpetual until Dni Vzkriesenie? Kto god GOD zadovazit ona mozem s kypry? Ona nie hear
Say Co if GOD robit daylight perpetual until Dni Vzkriesenie? Kto god GOD zadovazit ona night tvoj zvysok? Ona nie see
(bol zlutovanie Him He created ona night dni v poradie zvysok night) potom seek Jeho provisions dni) ona bol appreciative
Dni pojdem when He ziadat them Kde idols ona robit je fabricated rank Mna
My select z kazdy obec svedok potom say Present tvoj proof They realize potom all truth belongs GOD chvila idols they fabricated zhyraly them

(Qaaroon slave driver) bol 1 z Moses' ludia zradit them oppressed them! My dat him vela treasures kluc thereof bol skoro i heavy for strongest hand Jeho zaludnit said do him nie bol arrogant; GOD nie laska those bol arrogant
Pouzivat provisions bestowed upon ona by GOD seek abode Hereafter zanedbat tvoj share v this world Je charitable mat rad GOD bol charitable towards ona. Nie keep zhnity zem! GOD NIE LASKA corruptors
